name: Bring it Back
description:
Disclaimer:

Bring it Back is a student project. It is not finished, not published, and not currently in production. We give you access to a playable build we used as a demo. Be aware that the game you are about to play may contain bugs, glitches, unwanted behaviors... but it also contains a lot of fun! That's why we chose to make it accessible.

***

Bring it Back is a cooperative party game about stealing stuff! Play with your friends as 4 burglars from Polipolis, the city of robbery. And try to become the best burglars in town by emptying every places you cross in the shortest amount of time.

***

How to play:

This game can only be played by 4 players!
You need to connect 4 Xbox360 controllers to your computer in order to play.

***

"Show me your dev" is a documentary on the development of Bring it Back. It was made by Doc Geraud and you can watch it here : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=paVY8DNo5LE

***
